programme.title: Men's Pole Vault Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's Pole Vault Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 05/08/2024. Armand Duplantis (SWE) broke the World Record with a height of 6.25m. Sam Kendricks (USA) won Silver and Emmanouil Karalis (GRE) completed the podium.

programme.title: Women's High Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's High Jump Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 04/08/24. Yaroslava Mahuchikh (UKR) won the Gold with a height of 2.00m. Nicola Olyslagers (AUS) won the Silver and Iryna Gerashchenko (UKR) and Eleanor Patterson (AUS) came in joint third.

programme.title: Day Jobs | Episode 4
programme.desc: Thomas and Glen Murihead, a pair of curling brothers, are also sheep farmers while judoka Ben Fletcher works at a family gardening shop.

programme.title: Fashion Olympics: Making a Mark
programme.desc: Discover all those athletes that have made a brand of themselves based in style and performance.

programme.title: Women's Synchronised 10m Platform | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Synchronised 10m Platform Diving took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 31/07/24. Yuxi Chen/Hongchan Quan (CHN) won the Gold Medal, Jin Mi Jo/Mi Rae Kim (PRK) won the Silver Medal, and Andrea Spendolini/Lois Toulson (GBR) won the Bronze Medal.

programme.title: Men's Synchronised 3m Springboard | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
The Men's Synchronised 3m Springboard competition took place at the Aquatics Centre on 02/08/24.
Gold Medalists Long Daoyi and Wang Zongyuan (CHN), Silver Medalists Juan Manuel Celaya Hernandez and Osmar Olvera Ibarra (MEX) and Bronze Medalists Anthony Harding and Jack Laugher (GBR) stood on the podium during the Diving medal ceremony.

programme.desc: In this episode: Agentinian sport climber Valentina Aguado, Mexican diver Randal Willars Valdez, and Puerto Rican boxer Lionel Colon.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Diver: Is Yona Knight-Wisdom's physique perfectly balanced?
programme.desc: Jamaica's first-ever male Olympic diver is physically analysed in a lab with some remarkable results.

programme.desc: What happens when a World Champion Weightlifter tries to dive? How strong is the world's best diver?

programme.title: Men's Qualification & Final | Trampoline Gymnastics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This event took place on 02/08/2024 at the Bercy Arena, Paris. Ivan Litvinovich (AIN) claimed Gold, Zisai Wang (CHN) took Silver and Langyu Yan (CHN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Sports Swap: Basketball vs Trampoline with Emmeline Ndongue & Kat Driscoll
programme.desc: Can an Olympic trampolinist shoot a 3-pointer? Can a basketball Olympic silver medallist learn a trampoline routine in a day?

programme.title: Meet the Olympian bouncing between trampoline and her career as a doctor
programme.desc: Three-time Olympian Ana Rente stumbled into a medical career, but although finding time for training is draining the rewards are huge.

programme.title: Women's 3m Springboard Semi-Final | Diving | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's 3m Springboard Diving Semi-Finals took place at the Aquatics Centre in France on the 8/08/24. Yiwen Chen (CHN), Maddison KEENEY (AUS) and Chiara PELLACANI (ITA) were the best of the session.

programme.title: Women's Triple Jump Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Triple Jump Final took place on 03/08/2024 at the Stade de France. Thea LaFond (DMA) took the Gold with a 15.02m jump. Shanieka Ricketts (JAM) took the Silver and Jasmine Moore (USA) took the Bronze.

programme.title: Women's Javelin Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Javelin Throw Final took place at Stade de France on the 10/08/24. Haruka Kitaguchi (JPN) won the Gold medal, Jo-Ane van Dyk (RSA) won the Silver medal and Nikola Ogrodníkova (CZE) won the Bronze medal.

programme.desc: This event took place on 01/08/2024 around Trocadéro. Pintado (ECU) claimed the Gold, Bonfim (BRA) Silver and Martin (ESP) completed the podium

programme.title: EGY-MAR - Men's Bronze Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Bronze Medal match with Egypt and Morocco, at La Beaujoire Stadium, Nantes, on 08/08/24. Final score MAR 6:0 EGY.

programme.title: Can an Olympic legend turn around Hout Bay's football team?

programme.title: ESP-GER - Women's Bronze Medal Match | Football | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Women's Bronze Medal Match Spain v Germany, at Lyon Stadium, Lyon, on 09/08/24. Final score GER 1:0 ESP.

programme.title: Men's Discus Throw Final | Athletics | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: The Men's Discus Throw Final took place at the Stade de France, France, on 07/08/24. Roje Stona (JAM) won the Gold with an Olympic Record distance of 70.00m. Mykolas Alekna (LTU) claimed Silver, and Matthew Denny (AUS) completed the podium.

programme.title: Semi-Finals & Finals - Day 14 | Canoe Sprint | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc:
This session contains the Women's Canoe and Kayak Doubles 500m Semi-Finals and Finals, the Men's Kayak Double 500m Semi-Finals and Finals and the Men's Canoe Single 1000m Semi-Finals and Finals which took place at the Vaires-Sur-Marne Nautical Stadium on 09/08/24.
The Women's Canoe Double 500m Final was won by Xu /Sun (CHN) with Gold, Luzan/Rybachok (UKR) took silver and Mackenzie/Vincent (CAN) with Bronze.
The Women's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Carrington/Hoskin (NZL) with Gold, Csipes/Gazso (HUN) with Silver and a tie in Bronze for Paulina Paszek/Julie Marie Hake (GER) and Pupp/Fojt (HUN).
The Men's Kayak Double 500m Final was won by Schopf/Lemke (GER) with Gold, Bence Nadas/Totka (HUN) with Silver and Van Der Westhuyzen/Green (AUS) with Bronze.
The Men's Canoe Single 1000m Final was won by Martin Fuksa (CZE) with Gold, Isaquias Queiroz (BRA) with Silver and Serghei Tarnovschi (MDA) with Bronze.

programme.title: Men's 10km | Marathon Swimming | Olympic Games Paris 2024
programme.desc: This Men's 10km Marathon Swimming took place at Pont Alexandre III, France, on 09/08/2024. Kristof Rasovszky (HUN) won the Gold, with a time of 1:50:52.7 hour. Oliver Klemet (GER) won the Silver, and David Betlehem (HUN) completed the podium.

programme.title: Teenage duo Suratwadi & Wiberg have Olympic and Paralympic Games in focus
programme.desc: Hard work and a willingness to learn keep weightlifter Phonnapha Suratwadi and wheelchair racer Ty Wiberg on course for the Games.
